name: Danish Energy / Dansk Energi
goal:
Danish Energy (Dansk Energi) is a commercial and professional organisation for Danish energy companies. It is managed and financed by its member companies, mainly the electricity companies, and works to secure for them the most free and favourable conditions for competition in order to ensure development, growth and business friendly environment in Denmark.

Danish Energy represents the interests of its member companies and thus conducts regular contacts with government, authorities etc. nationally and within the EU.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Electricity Regulation, Electricity Directive, RES Directive, Energy Efficiency Directive, Energy Performance of Buildings Directive, ACER Regulation, Risk Preparedness Regulation, Governance Regulation
